# Data Display

## Base R

```{r show-data}
data(diamonds, package = "ggplot2")
head(diamonds)
```

## Using `knitr::kable()`

```{r show-data-2}
knitr::kable(head(diamonds))
```

## With `DT::datatable()`

```{r show-data-3}
DT::datatable(head(diamonds))
```

```{r show-data-4}
head(diamonds)
```
